perturbation.original_text:
C. A *donation of $0.05 per Unit sold of Licensed Products within the Contract Territory payable to the **NFL Alumni Northern California Chapter. Donated amounts will be allocated and dispersed to the Northern California Chapter beginning on the first full quarter [three (3) month period] of the Agreement and continue on a quarterly basis thereafter for the term of this Agreement. Where the following per Unit conversion shall apply for the term of this Agreement:

 a. (1) Bottle of BlackMP LivingWater = 1 Unit

 b. (1) 4oz bottle of BlackMPConcentrate = 30 Units

 c. (1) Bottle of Zezel ProbioticWater = 1 Unit

 d. (1) Bottle of Zayin Sports Water = 1 Unit  e. (1) Bottle Gridiron MVP™ Water= 1 Unit

 f. (1) Bottle Gridiron CBD H20 Probiotics™ Water = 1 Unit

 g. (1) 4oz bottle of Gridiron MVP™Concentrate = 30 Units

 _____________  * The NFLA-NC will donate 15% of the above described proceeds to the NFLA.  ** The Company will provide to the NFLA-NC upon request the most recent quarterly sales report of the Company's Licensed Products.
perturbation.changed_text:
C. A *donation of $0.05 per Unit sold of Licensed Products within the Contract Territory payable to the **NFL Alumni Northern California Chapter. Donated amounts will be allocated and dispersed to the Northern California Chapter beginning on the first full quarter [three (3) month period] of the Agreement and continue on a quarterly basis thereafter for the first year of this Agreement. After the first year, donated amounts will be allocated and dispersed annually. Where the following per Unit conversion shall apply for the term of this Agreement:

 a. (1) Bottle of BlackMP LivingWater = 1 Unit

 b. (1) 4oz bottle of BlackMPConcentrate = 30 Units

 c. (1) Bottle of Zezel ProbioticWater = 1 Unit

 d. (1) Bottle of Zayin Sports Water = 1 Unit  e. (1) Bottle Gridiron MVP™ Water= 1 Unit

 f. (1) Bottle Gridiron CBD H20 Probiotics™ Water = 1 Unit

 g. (1) 4oz bottle of Gridiron MVP™Concentrate = 30 Units

 _____________  * The NFLA-NC will donate 15% of the above described proceeds to the NFLA.  ** The Company will provide to the NFLA-NC upon request the most recent quarterly or annual sales report of the Company's Licensed Products, depending on the dispersal schedule.
perturbation.explanation: The modified text introduces a contradiction by changing the disbursement schedule of donated amounts. Initially, it's quarterly for the entire term. Now, it's quarterly for the first year, then annually. This creates ambiguity regarding the payment terms after the first year, leading to potential disputes. In addition, it also contradicts the reporting structure, creating further ambiguity.

perturbation.original_text:
As used in this Agreement, the following terms shall be defined as follows:

 F. "Licensed Products" shall mean BlackMP Living Water, BlackMP Concentrate, Zezel Probiotic Water, Zayin Sports Water, Gridiron CBD H2O Probiotics™ Water, Gridiron MVP™ and Gridiron MVP™ Concentrate using the Pro Football Legends Logo on the Licensed Products' affixed labels, hang-tags or packaging. Other products of the Company may be added to the list of Licensed Products during the Contract Period by written amendment to this Agreement. All amendments to this Agreement must be signed by all parties to this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text:
As used in this Agreement, the following terms shall be defined as follows:

 F. "Licensed Products" shall initially mean BlackMP Living Water, BlackMP Concentrate, Zezel Probiotic Water, Zayin Sports Water, Gridiron CBD H2O Probiotics™ Water, Gridiron MVP™ and Gridiron MVP™ Concentrate using the Pro Football Legends Logo on the Licensed Products' affixed labels, hang-tags or packaging. Other products of the Company may be added to the list of Licensed Products during the Contract Period by written notification to the NFLA-NC representative, and the Company's internal records will be the sole determinant of whether a product is considered a 'Licensed Product'. All parties agree that an amendment to the agreement will NOT be necessary.
perturbation.explanation: This change contradicts the original clause requiring a written amendment signed by all parties to add new products to the 'Licensed Products' list. The modified text now allows the Company to add products by simply notifying the NFLA-NC representative, and the Company's records are the determinant if a product is considered 'Licensed Product', creating uncertainty and removes the other parties' control over which products are subject to the agreement's terms. This creates potential for dispute and ambiguity.

perturbation.original_text: The NFLA, NFLA-NC and the Company (collectively the "Parties") agree that this Addendum I shall be affixed and be enforceable under the terms of the Endorsement Agreement executed by the Parties on October 30, 2017.
perturbation.changed_text: The NFLA, NFLA-NC and the Company (collectively the "Parties") agree that this Addendum I shall be affixed and be enforceable under the terms of the Endorsement Agreement executed by the Parties on October 30, 2017. However, in the event of a conflict between this Addendum and the original agreement, the Company's interpretation shall prevail.
perturbation.explanation: This modification creates a contradiction by stating that the Addendum is enforceable under the terms of the original agreement, but then gives the Company the final say in interpretation if there's a conflict. This undermines the concept of mutual agreement and could lead to the Company unilaterally altering the terms of the agreement to its advantage, creating legal uncertainty for NFLA and NFLA-NC.
